GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 17 June 2024
The  prevailing  rainy  condition  in  the  south-western  part  of  the  island  is  expected  to  be  somewhat
enhanced in the next few days from 19th June.

S
everal spells of showers will occur in Western, Sabaragamuwa and North-western provinces and in Galle,
Matara, Kandy and Nuwara-Eliya districts.

trong winds of about (40-50) kmph can be expected at times over the Western slopes of the central hills,
Northern, North-central and North-western provinces and in Trincomalee, Hambantota and Monaragala
districts.
